Key Match Events: The Pacers scored 129 points against the Bulls with a 126.5 offensive rating.
The Bulls defense struggled to keep the Pacers away from the rim, allowing them to score 76 points in the paint, the second most the Bulls have allowed to an opponent this season.
Pre-Game Insights: The Chicago Bulls were 9-6 over their previous 15 games with the 12th best defense in the NBA, allowing opponents to score just 112.1 points per 100 possessions over that time.
